item.title: Ideas for Projects to Do
item.description: I have a lot of ideas for future projects. I’ll probably never get to do most of them. So let me list some of them so that you may give them a try. Sudoku Solver Yes, I know many people have done this already. I really like the idea though so I wanna try it without looking at other people’s solutions. Of course, you’re free to do it in whatever way you like, but you’ll probably need a GUI for it.
